alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:51PM CDT until July 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... North central Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tombigbee State Park, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Fulton, Verona, Tombigbee State Park, Plantersville, Mantachie, Smithville, New Salem, Evergreen, Skyline, Abney, Cardsville, Turon, Tilden, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Dorsey, Jacinto and Parham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
